The image of the: Netflix and Chill" contest circulating on Twitter was not found on Senator Ted Cruz's official campaign website.
The color scheme: headers, and fonts on the "Netflix and Chill" contest graphic did not match those of the Cruz campaign site.
The: Netflix and Chill" contest was most likely created as a joke to mock Senator Cruz's religious beliefs and his advocacy for "traditional marriage."
The term: Netflix and Chill" is slang for engaging in sexual activity while having Netflix playing in the background, which contradicts Senator Cruz's conservative stance on sexual matters.
